definition: to inspect one by one/to list individually

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Arrange the machine daily check, preventive maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 安排設備的日常點檢，保養。

sentences.english: Be responsible for implement the machine's maintenance and daily checking.
sentences.chinese: 負責機牀的日常保養和點檢的落實。

sentences.english: Jin replaced both front of palace of Inspection Division, and the Yuan dynasty, no.
sentences.chinese: 金朝改爲殿前都點檢司，而元朝不設。

sentences.english: Checklist &specifications or relevant materials to be all listed in instruction documents.
sentences.chinese: 點檢清單及規格或相關資料都詳細列明在指引文件內。

sentences.english: The importance of precision time-check for modern large equipment is also expatiated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 闡述現代化大型設備實施精密點檢的重要性。

sentences.english: Second, an improved corner detection algorithm based on multi-scale space was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 其次，提出在多尺度空間下改進角點檢測算法。

sentences.english: It is one year since New Iron-making Plant implemented precision time-check for equipment.
sentences.chinese: 總結鍊鐵新廠一年來精密點檢工作的開展情況。

sentences.english: Using the spot inspection management should combine with the actual situation of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 運用點檢制，應與企業實際情況相聯繫。

sentences.english: The expected cost per unit of time for a sequential inspection policy is derived.
sentences.chinese: 首先導出了點檢時間序列相對應的期望成本。

sentences.english: Conduct daily spot check on temperature, time and pressure.
sentences.chinese: 對溫度，時間，壓力進行日常點檢。

sentences.english: Regular maintenance can prevent many problems before they begin.
sentences.chinese: 經常的點檢維護能預防很多問題的發生。

sentences.english: In this paper, the concept, theory and procedure of spot inspection maintenance system are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了點檢維修制的概念和理論，及其實施的程序。

definition: past events/relics from a former age/ruins
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
to restore old way/to return to the past
